announcements.name: [December 7] SkyBlock Patch Notes
announcements.description:
Hi!
We have rolled another small SkyBlock patch today, mostly containing fixes to the Advent Calendar.

Advent Calendar

Fixed past days being unclaimable when it was the 1st gift bundle, or the player had met the requirements for that day and just didn't claim it.
Made already claimed rewards in each bundle more clear.
Made the required rank show for sprays, furniture, etc if the player did not meet the rank requirement.
Added a command to open the SkyBlock advent calendar, /sbadvent
Potion Effects

Added a sort option to the Active Effects Menu.
Added a filter option to the Toggle Potion Effects Menu.
Fixed Night Vision effect sometimes disappearing from the Active Effects Menu.
Other

Fixed some Bingo goal typos.
Fixed an issue where Fire Sale previews would stick around longer than they should've.

If you have a bug to report to us, please make a report HERE! Thanks to everyone who has reported bugs!1

announcements.name: [December 5] SkyBlock Patch Notes
announcements.description: Hey all! We are here to inform you about the latest update that was just rolled to SkyBlock!

announcements.name: Patch Notes 0.19.8 - Winter Update and Secret Bingo
announcements.description: Hello! Welcome to SkyBlock Patch 0.19.8. Today's update contains a new Advent Calendar, new gifting rewards on Jerryâ€™s Workshop, Secret Bingo, several bug fixes, and more!
